website_summaries.verdict: Recommended for those who want to wear thongs but prefer to stick to mostly cotton blends.
pros: Stretchy cotton is soft and smooth, even to those with sensitive skin
Mid-size waistband lies flat and won't ride up or roll down
CK loyalists love the big logo
cons: Waistband and elastic leg holes can cut into your sides and thighs, even if you're wearing the correct size

customer_reviews.title: Would have gave 5 stars, but think these were ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have gave 5 stars, but think these were store rejects or fake because they have tags are in the front on inside and are long wide HUGE tags. I buy these exact CK thongs at the mall store and none have a tag on front and is a print tag on material on back. I kept them because they way cheaper than mall and just cut the tags out.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Classic Calvin’s!!
customer_reviews.text: 17 and 20yr old girlies love these.. love the thick waste band as it doesn’t roll or bunch like we all know panties can do! Fit is nice in workout and regular pants alike.. they love the added “middle” support and no it doesn’t cut into them like some thicker bands will.. classic colors. I always wash with bra/panty/sock load and just hang them to dry.. (it takes just minutes to do so!) Ha! Then, you never worry about them tangling up in dryer that way and elastic lasts forever without the heat!
customer_reviews.author: The Girl Utah

customer_reviews.title: ... couple of these on a whim thinking I would like them more than I do
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these on a whim thinking I would like them more than I do. I find that the waist band pinches just a little bit, while I prefer a more seamless feel.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: OK - low quality, somewhat uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable thong, and the quality is not great - one of the seams is already unraveling and I've only worn once.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: The elastic is very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love CK Invisibles, yet so many people wear these, so I decided to give it a try. These panties aren't cut properly. The underwear itself is a bit large for me and creates an odd bulky shape on the sides. The elastic is way smaller than the cotton part of the panties, and it digs into the skin. I have a narrow waist, but these are very uncomfortable and impossible to wear.
customer_reviews.author: KateWayTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit item (Fake)
customer_reviews.text: Fake. Don’t make the mistake of purchasing, tags are in the front, sizes are drastically smaller than they should be. These went straight into the garbage. Didn’t even bother with a return.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Authentic but ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price got one for my wife’s birthday since she’s 100 percent cotton gal o thought these would work well. They look super sexy . My only issue as mentioned by previous customers is there was a giant tag in FRONT? I’m a bit confused and wonder if it’s not a factory second or something.
customer_reviews.author: Plow&TheTrowell

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not cotton, not the good thick strap, dint be tricked, it is more of a dry fit material and the strap is only about 1” not the 2” strap.
customer_reviews.author: pember

customer_reviews.title: Win some you lose some
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of bummed about these. They dig into your hips. And after only 2-3 wears n washes they got a hole in them.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Sara

customer_reviews.title: Best CK thong yet
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable CK thong I have bought. More room in the front and this cotton is really soft too. Wish it came in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: S. W.

customer_reviews.title: General
customer_reviews.text: For any guys out there that like to wear em, they fit really well, they are comfortable and support where needed without anyother issues. The material is made very well and the band that goes around the waste it wider than most other panties like this. I would recommend getting the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lone survivor

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves CK thongs. Fit great and hold up well through washings.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Only problem is the band creases and tries to roll a bit
customer_reviews.author: ALT

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made, soft material. Happy with product. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Fits perfect. I’m a plus size 18
customer_reviews.author: Ms Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. Not too big, not too small. Just right.
customer_reviews.author: Meara Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Extra muffin top with the elastic band
customer_reviews.text: I just want to find a pair of undies that don’t dig into the side of your hip. The elastic needs to be a little looser
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Guys can wear them too
customer_reviews.text: the material is soft and feel is relaxing I am a guy who enjoys wearing thongs daily and have found these to very enjoyable having enough room to hold me in place,
customer_reviews.author: otek

customer_reviews.title: Great thong
customer_reviews.text: Great thong for men plenty of room for the guys will be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit. Some may not like the waistband of ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit. Some may not like the waistband of it, but that was one of the reasons I bought it and I think it's an excellent pair of underwear!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable I loved them so much I bought more .
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Serrato

product_meta.title: Calvin Klein Ultimate Cotton Thong Panty
product_meta.description: The stretch-cotton thong ensures an invisible finish under clothing and the elasticized logo waistband align with added coverage and support.
